channel.title: Can't copy files from USB to computer HALP!
channel.description:
I have a USB 2.0 stick and I can't copy the files to my computer.
What happens is when I select all the files, click copy, paste onto my desktop I get the message saying preparing to copy, that disappears and the files don't copy.
I'm using Win7. I think it's a windows problem, so any ideas?

item.title: Can't copy files from USB to computer HALP!
item.dc:creator: @Death_Style Death Style
item.description:
@Death_Style wrote:

you never cease to surprise me

Read full topic

item.title: Can't copy files from USB to computer HALP!

item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Ambokile:

[quote author=Ashi link=topic=664160.msg4439633#msg4439633 date=1406131066]I think

There’s the problem, try to avoid it in future[/quote]
Okay, I know it’s a windows problem because this shit wouldn’t happen on Linux!
